00047 int DisplayProgram::main(const std::vector<CL_String> &args)
00048 {
00049         try
00050         {
00051         if(AllocConsole()) {
00052                 freopen("CONOUT$", "w", stdout); //redirect std io to it
00053                 SetConsoleTitle("Debug Console");
00054                 SetConsoleTextAttribute(GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_BLUE | FOREGROUND_RED);  
00055         }
00056 
00057 
00058         CL_SetupCore setup_core;
00059         CL_SetupDisplay setup_display;
00060         CL_SetupGL setup_gl;
00061         CL_SetupSound setup_sound;
00062 
00063         CL_DisplayWindow window("Snow Leopard", 800, 600);
00064         CL_GraphicContext graphics_context = window.get_gc();
00065         SL::gc = &graphics_context;
00066         CL_InputContext input_context = window.get_ic();
00067         SL::ic = &input_context;
00068 
00069         CL_InputDevice keyboard = ic->get_keyboard();
00070         CL_InputDevice mouse = ic->get_mouse();
00071 
00072         
00073         
00074         cout << "Now Debugging..." <<endl;
00075 
00076         int scenario;
00077         if (args.size() > 1)
00078                 scenario = atoi(args[1].c_str());
00079         else
00080                 scenario = 10;
00081 
00082 
00083          switch (scenario)
00084          {
00085                 case 1: SL::ws = loadScenario1(); break;
00086                 case 2: SL::ws = loadScenario2(); break;
00087                 case 3: SL::ws = loadScenario3(); break;
00088                 case 4: SL::ws = loadScenario4(); break;
00089                 case 5: SL::ws = loadScenario5(); break;
00090                 case 6: SL::ws = loadScenario6(); break;
00091                 case 7: SL::ws = loadScenario7(); break;
00092                 case 8: SL::ws = loadScenario8(); break;
00093                 case 9: SL::ws = loadScenario9(); break;
00094                 case 10: SL::ws = loadScenario10(); break;
00095          }
00096 
00097         Renderer* renderer = new Renderer();
00098         SL::ren = renderer;
00099         GameLogic* logic = new GameLogic();
00100         SL::gl = logic;
00101 
00102         GFrameHandler frame_handler;
00103         frame_handler.set_fps_limit(60);
00104 
00105         while (true)
00106         {
00107         renderer->Render();
00108         window.flip();
00109         frame_handler.limit_frame();
00110         frame_handler.calculate();
00111         //cout << "fps" << frame_handler.get_fps() << endl;
00112         if (CL_DisplayMessageQueue::has_messages())
00113                 CL_DisplayMessageQueue::process();
00114         logic->step();
00115         }
00116         
00117         return 0;
00118         }
00119         catch (CL_Exception err) {
00120                 std::cout << "Exception caught: " << err.message.c_str() << std::endl;
00121                 getchar();
00122                 return -1;
00123         }
00124 }
